name: Specter Desktop
short_description: Bitcoin wallet interface with focus on privacy and security.
description: Bitcoin wallet interface with focus on privacy and security. Specter Desktop is a self-hosted application focused on security, tools, bitcoin, crypto. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Specter Desktop on your home server to bitcoin wallet interface with focus on privacy and security without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Specter Desktop to manage your security workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
